title: New EU anti-migrant deal will help Rishi Sunak ‘stop the boats’, claims French politician
description: French MEP Fabienne Keller, of the Renew Europe group, who led the negotiations, insisted the Geneva Convention will be “fully applied” in the so-called waiting zones, adding: “If I may make a comparison, instead of sending people to Rwanda, we are doing it on European soil.”

title: Troubles legacy act: Ireland takes human rights case against UK
description: The UK's controversial Troubles legacy act became law in September, despite opposition from Dublin and all Northern Ireland's main political parties. Critics argued the law gave an amnesty and removed access to justice. Northern Ireland Secretary Chris Heaton-Harris said he "profoundly regrets" the Irish decision.

description: Panto is many people's first introduction to the theatre, hopefully igniting a lifelong love of live performance. description: Tourists have been warned against going to a number of holiday destinations in 2024 amid political unrest and climate change. International SOS has revealed the places most likely to result in issues for travellers due to factors including violence and crime.

title: 2024 will be the year the housing crisis dwarfs the cost of living
description: The real story of 2024 may well be that the cost of living crisis will be replaced by a cost of housing crisis. Even if wages finally outpace inflation, and even if some food and energy prices ease, the sheer difficulty in paying a rent or mortgage may further undermine any sense of security.
